document.full_text: a pastor testified on monday in the federal trial of a white man accused of torching his mostly black church to protest barack obama's election as the nation's first black president.
document.title: trial of white man accused of black church fire begins
lines_and_colors: a pastor testified on monday in the federal trial of a white man accused of torching his mostly black church to protest barack obama's election as the nation's first black president.
